subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: just joined - where do i start?
msgSnippet: After these good suggestions, my advice to you is to start writing as soon as possible.  This is by far the quickest way to learn. If you would like to start
messageBody:
After these good suggestions, my advice to you is to start writing as soon as possible.  This is by far the quickest way to learn.
 
If you would like to start corresponding then I suggest you join the Read_Alphabet_Letters group.  In the meantime, if you would like to handwrite, scan and email to me I will be happy to correct and encourage :) as well as to give you some reading practice in return.
 
regards
 
Moira

 
On 22/01/2008, peter_r_guinness <malt99@...> wrote:

--- In Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com, "B.C. Siegl" <bcsiegl@...> wrote:
>
> Hi, I just joined the group and am interested in learning QS. Where
do i
> start?
> Thanks in advance.
> BcS
>

You could try my Alice-in-Wonderland tutorials here:
http://members.optusnet.com.au/~malt99/project_quickscript_website/inde
x.html
But please note that the tutorials use the General Australian accent
(eg: they drop the rhotic R so that it is quicker and easier for
Australians to learn).




--
Moira O'Brien
